18 #ifndef GANDIVA_PROJECTOR_CACHE_KEY_H
19 #define GANDIVA_PROJECTOR_CACHE_KEY_H
20 
21 #include <memory>
22 #include <string>
23 #include <vector>
24 
25 #include "gandiva/arrow.h"
26 #include "gandiva/projector.h"
27 
28 namespace gandiva {
29 class ProjectorCacheKey {
30  public:
31  ProjectorCacheKey(SchemaPtr schema, std::shared_ptr<Configuration> configuration,
32  ExpressionVector expression_vector)
33  : schema_(schema), configuration_(configuration) {
34  static const int kSeedValue = 4;
35  size_t result = kSeedValue;
36  for (auto& expr : expression_vector) {
37  std::string expr_as_string = expr->ToString();
38  expressions_as_strings_.push_back(expr_as_string);
39  boost::hash_combine(result, expr_as_string);
40  }
41  boost::hash_combine(result, configuration);
42  boost::hash_combine(result, schema_->ToString());
43  hash_code_ = result;
44  }
45 
46  std::size_t Hash() const { return hash_code_; }
47 
48  bool operator==(const ProjectorCacheKey& other) const {
49  // arrow schema does not overload equality operators.
50  if (!(schema_->Equals(*other.schema().get(), true))) {
51  return false;
52  }
53 
54  if (configuration_ != other.configuration_) {
55  return false;
56  }
57 
58  if (expressions_as_strings_ != other.expressions_as_strings_) {
59  return false;
60  }
61  return true;
62  }
63 
64  bool operator!=(const ProjectorCacheKey& other) const { return !(*this == other); }
65 
66  SchemaPtr schema() const { return schema_; }
67 
68  private:
69  const SchemaPtr schema_;
70  const std::shared_ptr<Configuration> configuration_;
71  std::vector<std::string> expressions_as_strings_;
72  size_t hash_code_;
73 };
74 } // namespace gandiva
75 #endif // GANDIVA_PROJECTOR_CACHE_KEY_H
